alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 3:09PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Yukon River at Stevens Village. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying area is occurring. Some roads are inundated with water, including over a foot or more of water over the airport access road. Homes and other structures in lower parts of the village may have water surround or flood them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - As of 11:30 AM AKDT Friday, water levels are steady on the Porcupine and are now dropping on the Upper Yukon at Dawson and Eagle. Water levels are currently steady in Fort Yukon but are expected to slowly recede over the weekend into the next week. Stevens Village is seeing higher water than observed during breakup. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood If you live near or along the Yukon River at Stevens Village stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
